plugin.name: Whiterun: Statue of Kynareth
plugin.description:
Statue of Kynareth https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/91358
[Only Meshes and Textures needed]
Incompatible with the following mods: Capital Whiterun Expansion Dawn of Skyrim JKs Skyrim Spaghetti's Cities SKYKLFs Whiterun Enhancer

plugin.name: Whiterun: Rapid Rocks
plugin.description:
Replaces the rocks in the water stream in Whiterun.
Recommended but Not Required: Rapid Rocks - By Pfuscher https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/26532

plugin.name: Nature of the Wild Lands
plugin.description:
Required: Nature of the Wild Lands Minimum version supported: 3.0
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/63604 Note: (Nature of the Wildlands - Forest Debris Only) Not Supported

plugin.name: Traverse the Ulvenwald
plugin.description:
Required: Traverse the Ulvenwald Minimum version supported: 3.1
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/57874

plugin.name: All-In-One
plugin.description: If all locations are selected an All-In-One tree swap add-on will be installed instead of 14 single plugins.

plugin.name: Witcher Plants (BaseObjectSwapper)
plugin.description: Randomly replace the shrubs around Skyrim using Base Object Swapper

plugin.name: Cathedral - 3D Mountain Flowers
plugin.description: Requires: Base Object Swapper

plugin.name: Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul
plugin.description: Requires: Base Object Swapper

plugin.name: JK's Whiterun Outskirts - Reach Trees [By: Minadorae]
plugin.description:
Requires: Base Object Swapper
By: Minadorae "Lowers the z-axis of three floating reach trees. May be related to new meshes from Improved Vanilla Reach Trees. Check in-game before grabbing this patch. The easiest tree to check is on the west side of Honningbrew Meadery."

plugin.name: SFO Summer Edition II: Complete
plugin.description: Do not use with the Grass Only versions of SFO Summer Edition II
